00010 int modules::parser::TokeniseByWhiteSpace(const std::string& input, std::vector<std::string>& output){
00011     std::stringstream ss(input);
00012     std::string val;
00013     while(ss>>val) output.push_back(val);
00014     return output.size();
00015 }

00017 int modules::parser::TokeniseByDelimiter(const std::string& input, std::vector<std::string>& output, const char* delim){
00018     char line[modules::parser::max_line];
00019     strcpy(line,input.c_str());
00020     char* word = strtok(line,delim);
00021     while(word != NULL){ 
00022             //std::cout<<"ModulesOptions:GetVectorStringsByDelimiter() "<<word<<std::endl;
00023         output.push_back(word);
00024         word = strtok(NULL,delim);
00025     }
00026     return output.size();
00027 }

00029 std::string modules::parser::GetOneWord(const std::string& in, size_t start, size_t stop){
00030         std::stringstream ss(in.substr(start,stop-start));
00031         std::string word;
00032         ss>>word;
00033         return word;
00034 }

00036 std::pair<std::string,std::string> modules::parser::ParseConstructor(std::string input, char open, char close)
00037                 throw(modules::parser::errors::unmatched_parenthesis){
00038     size_t end_br=std::string::npos;
00039     size_t start_br=input.find(open);
00040     std::string first=GetOneWord(input,0,start_br);
00041     if(start_br!=std::string::npos){
00042        end_br=input.find(close,start_br+1);
00043        if(end_br==std::string::npos){
00044                throw modules::parser::errors::unmatched_parenthesis(open,close);
00045        }
00046     }
00047     std::string second=GetOneWord(input,start_br+1,end_br);
00048     return std::make_pair(first,second);
00049 }

00051 size_t modules::parser::RemoveWhitespace(std::string& input){
00052         std::string::iterator new_end=std::remove_if(input.begin(),input.end(),modules::parser::IsWhitespace);
00053         input.erase(new_end,input.end());
00054         return input.size();
00055 }
00056 
00057 bool modules::parser::IsWhitespace(char in){
00058         bool retval=false;
00059         switch(in){
00060                 case ' ': case '\t':
00061                         retval=true;
00062                         break;
00063                 default:
00064                         retval=false;
00065         }
00066         return retval;
00067 }

00069 bool modules::parser::IsDigit(char in){
00070         bool retval=false;
00071         switch(in){
00072                 case '0': case '1': case '2': case '3': case '4':
00073                 case '5': case '6': case '7': case '8': case '9':
00074                         retval=true;
00075         }
00076         return retval;
00077 }

00079 bool modules::parser::IsDecimal(char in){
00080         return in=='.';
00081 }

00083 bool modules::parser::IsFloatChar(char in){
00084         return IsDecimal(in) || IsDigit(in);
00085 }

00087 bool modules::parser::IsNotFloatChar(char in){
00088         return !IsFloatChar(in);
00089 }

00091 bool modules::parser::IsNumber(const std::string& input){
00092         return std::find_if(input.begin(),input.end(),IsNotFloatChar) == input.end();
00093 }

00095 int modules::parser::GetNumber(const std::string& input){
00096         int val;
00097         sscanf ( input.c_str(), "%d", &val );
00098         return val;
00099 }
